title: Heritage Karaikudi Family Escape with Chettinad Culinary Experiences
description:
Embark on a culinary adventure of authentic Chettinad flavours and old-world charm at Chidambara Vilas, a Chettiar palace that carefully preserves a 117-year-old legacy. Offering up an opulent feast for the senses and heritage design with soaring domes, glittering chandeliers and just 25 boutique rooms, this stunningly restored property near Karaikudi (just an eight-hour drive from Bengaluru) is the ultimate destination for a staycation. Experience an escape imbued with cultural and historic significance as you venture to nearby temples and savour the pride of the region, decadent Chettinad cuisine crafted with unique local flavours and fresh produce.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Enjoy daily interactive breakfast with Chettinad delicacies
- Relish one Chettinad special banana leaf lunch, once per stay, in the traditional lunch hall
- Experience the true flavours of the region with a cooking class, once per stay
- Embark on a morning heritage village walk, once per stay
- Take a guided tour of the 117-year-old mansion, filled with Chettinad history, once per stay
- Stay connected with complimentary Wi-Fi

**Travelling with family?** Two children (11 and under) stay free of charge, sharing existing bedding, with all package inclusions.

**Longer stay bonus**: Stay 4+ nights and you will also enjoy one three-course/buffet dinner, once per stay.
offer_address: TSK House, Ramachandrapuram Kadiapatti, Off Fort Tirumayam, Tamil Nadu 622505
